=INPUT_URL="{{ $json.DirectUrl }}"
REL_PATH=$(echo "$INPUT_URL" | sed -E 's@https?://[^/]+/@@')
INPUT_FILE="/files/$REL_PATH"

# ---------- Configurable variables (change these) ----------
ASSETS_DIR="/files/extra"
FONT_FILE="ARIALBD 1.TTF"        # place any TTF you upload into /files/extra and set the filename here

# Where screenshot will be placed on final video (overlay anchor)
PLACEMENT="top-right"            # top-right, top-left, bottom-right, bottom-left

# Screenshot icon + views placement (used to draw screenshot; separate from PLACEMENT)
ICON_SIZE=64
ICON_OFFSET_X=24                 # distance from left of screenshot (when creating screenshot)
ICON_OFFSET_Y=2400                 # distance from top/bottom for the icon when creating screenshot
TEXT_GAP=5                       # gap between icon and views text inside screenshot
FONTSIZE=48                      # font size for the views number in screenshot
TEXT_OFFSET_X=0
TEXT_OFFSET_Y=-10
RAND_MIN=1
RAND_MAX=100

# Overlay (screenshot) scaling + offset for final video
OVERLAY_W=520
OVERLAY_H=680
OVERLAY_OFFSET_X=20              # distance from chosen corner (final video)
OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y=120              # distance from chosen corner (final video)

# Caption bar + emoji settings (exposed)
BAR_HEIGHT=110                   # caption background height (pixels)
BAR_OFFSET_Y=0                   # distance from TOP of video to the caption bar (px)
BAR_BG_OPACITY=150               # 0..255 (0 transparent, 255 opaque) for caption background
CAPTION_FONT_SIZE=64

EMOJI_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/emoji.png"   # optional emoji path (transparent PNG)
EMOJI_SIZE=74
EMOJI_OFFSET_X=260               # distance from LEFT edge of video for emoji
EMOJI_OFFSET_Y=20               # distance from TOP edge of video for emoji

# Show overlay from first frame by default
FRAME_DELAY_START=0

OUT_VIDEO="${ASSETS_DIR}/video_with_views.mp4"
FPS=30

# Safety defaults
DURATION_FALLBACK=300
TIMEOUT_PADDING=8
# ---------- End configurable ----------

# ---------- Derived / paths ----------
mkdir -p "$ASSETS_DIR"
FONT="${ASSETS_DIR}/${FONT_FILE}"
EYE_ICON="${ASSETS_DIR}/eye.png"
SCREENSHOT_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/frame_with_views.png"
TMP_FRAME="${ASSETS_DIR}/_tmp_frame.png"
VIEWS_IMG="${ASSETS_DIR}/_views_text.png"
CAPTION_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/caption_canvas.png"
# ---------- End derived ----------

VIEWS="$(shuf -i${RAND_MIN}-${RAND_MAX} -n1)M"

echo "INPUT_FILE: $INPUT_FILE"
echo "FONT: $FONT"
echo "VIEWS: $VIEWS"
echo "OUT_VIDEO: $OUT_VIDEO"
echo "ASSETS_DIR: $ASSETS_DIR"
echo "PLACEMENT: $PLACEMENT"
echo "FRAME_DELAY_START: $FRAME_DELAY_START"

# sanity check
if [ ! -f "$INPUT_FILE" ]; then
  echo "ERR: input not found: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
  exit 1
fi

# ensure eye icon exists (transparent fallback)
if [ ! -f "$EYE_ICON" ]; then
  echo "Note: eye icon missing at $EYE_ICON â€” creating transparent placeholder"
  ffmpeg -f lavfi -i "color=rgba(0,0,0,0):s=${ICON_SIZE}x${ICON_SIZE}:d=1" -frames:v 1 -y "$EYE_ICON"
fi

# 1) extract a single frame (at 2s) -> single png
echo "1/6: extracting frame at 2s -> $TMP_FRAME"
ffmpeg -ss 2 -i "$INPUT_FILE" -frames:v 1 -q:v 2 -y "$TMP_FRAME"

# compute video dimensions for placement math
VID_H=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=height -of csv=p=0 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 1080)
VID_W=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=width  -of csv=p=0 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 1080)
VID_H=${VID_H:-1080}
VID_W=${VID_W:-1080}

# For the screenshot placement: default behavior uses ICON_OFFSET from left and ICON_OFFSET_Y from top/bottom.
ICON_X=${ICON_OFFSET_X}
if [ "${PLACEMENT%%-*}" = "top" ]; then
  # NOTE: icon placement inside screenshot is independent from final overlay PLACEMENT,
  # but using the same PLACEMENT var here preserves your original bottom-left default if PLACEMENT=bottom-*
  ICON_Y=${ICON_OFFSET_Y}
else
  ICON_Y=$(( VID_H - ICON_OFFSET_Y - ICON_SIZE ))
fi

# Text inside screenshot (to the right of the icon by default)
TEXT_X=$(( ICON_X + ICON_SIZE + TEXT_GAP + TEXT_OFFSET_X ))
TEXT_Y=$(( ICON_Y + ICON_SIZE/2 - FONTSIZE/2 + TEXT_OFFSET_Y ))
if [ "$TEXT_Y" -lt 0 ]; then TEXT_Y=0; fi

echo "Computed screenshot ICON at (${ICON_X},${ICON_Y}), TEXT at (${TEXT_X},${TEXT_Y}), VID_W=${VID_W}, VID_H=${VID_H}"

# 2) Build screenshot image (icon + views) using Pillow (consistent and portable)
echo "2/6: Creating screenshot image (Pillow)"

# export values for python env access
export TMP_FRAME SCREENSHOT_PNG EYE_ICON VIEWS VIEWS_IMG FONT ICON_X ICON_Y ICON_SIZE TEXT_X TEXT_Y FONTSIZE

python3 - <<'PY'
import os
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

tmp_frame = os.environ["TMP_FRAME"]
out_png = os.environ["SCREENSHOT_PNG"]
eye_icon = os.environ["EYE_ICON"]
v = os.environ["VIEWS"]
views_img = os.environ["VIEWS_IMG"]
fontpath = os.environ.get("FONT", "")
ICON_X = int(os.environ.get("ICON_X", "24"))
ICON_Y = int(os.environ.get("ICON_Y", "84"))
ICON_SIZE = int(os.environ.get("ICON_SIZE", "64"))
TEXT_X = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_X", str(ICON_X + ICON_SIZE + 5)))
TEXT_Y = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_Y", str(ICON_Y)))
FONTSIZE = int(os.environ.get("FONTSIZE", "48"))

# open base frame
bg = Image.open(tmp_frame).convert("RGBA")

# open icon
icon = Image.open(eye_icon).convert("RGBA").resize((ICON_SIZE, ICON_SIZE))
bg.paste(icon, (ICON_X, ICON_Y), icon)

# pick font
candidates = [
    fontpath,
    "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf",
    "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/liberation/LiberationSans-Bold.ttf",
    "/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf",
    "/System/Library/Fonts/Supplemental/Arial.ttf"
]
font = None
for p in candidates:
    if p and os.path.isfile(p):
        try:
            font = ImageFont.truetype(p, FONTSIZE)
            break
        except Exception:
            font = None
if font is None:
    font = ImageFont.load_default()

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(bg)
draw.text((TEXT_X, TEXT_Y), v, font=font, fill=(255,255,255,255))

bg.save(out_png)
print(out_png)
PY

chmod 644 "$SCREENSHOT_PNG"
echo "WROTE screenshot $SCREENSHOT_PNG"

if [ ! -f "$SCREENSHOT_PNG" ]; then
  echo "ERR: screenshot image not created: $SCREENSHOT_PNG" >&2
  exit 1
fi

# 3) Build caption canvas (transparent PNG) "Thank you for ${VIEWS} views"
echo "3/6: Building caption PNG -> $CAPTION_PNG"
export CAPTION_PNG VID_W BAR_HEIGHT CAPTION_FONT_SIZE BAR_BG_OPACITY VIEWS FONT

python3 - <<'PY'
import os
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

out = os.environ["CAPTION_PNG"]
vidw = int(os.environ.get("VID_W", "1080"))
barh = int(os.environ.get("BAR_HEIGHT", "110"))
txt = f"Thank you for {os.environ.get('VIEWS','0M')} views"
fontsize = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_SIZE", "64"))
bar_opacity = int(os.environ.get("BAR_BG_OPACITY", "80"))
fontpath = os.environ.get("FONT", "")

candidates = [
    fontpath,
    "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf",
    "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/liberation/LiberationSans-Bold.ttf",
    "/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf",
    "/System/Library/Fonts/Supplemental/Arial.ttf"
]
font = None
for p in candidates:
    if p and os.path.isfile(p):
        try:
            font = ImageFont.truetype(p, fontsize)
            break
        except Exception:
            font = None
if font is None:
    font = ImageFont.load_default()
    fontsize = 16

tmp = Image.new("RGBA", (10,10), (0,0,0,0))
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(tmp)
try:
    bbox = draw.textbbox((0,0), txt, font=font)
    w = bbox[2]-bbox[0]; h = bbox[3]-bbox[1]
except Exception:
    w,h = draw.textsize(txt, font=font)

img = Image.new("RGBA", (vidw, barh), (0,0,0,0))
d = ImageDraw.Draw(img)

# semi-transparent black bar background - bar_opacity (0..255)
d.rectangle([(0,0),(vidw,barh)], fill=(0,0,0,bar_opacity))

# center text
tx = (vidw - w) // 2
ty = (barh - h) // 2
d.text((tx,ty), txt, font=font, fill=(255,255,255,255))

img.save(out)
print(out)
PY

chmod 644 "$CAPTION_PNG"
echo "WROTE caption PNG $CAPTION_PNG"

if [ ! -f "$CAPTION_PNG" ]; then
  echo "ERR: caption png not created" >&2
  exit 1
fi

# 4) Final composition â€” overlay screenshot (scaled) to chosen corner, draw caption bar at top center
echo "4/6: composing final video -> $OUT_VIDEO"

# compute overlay anchor depending on PLACEMENT
case "$PLACEMENT" in
  top-right)
    OV_X_EXPR="W-w-${OVERLAY_OFFSET_X}"
    OV_Y_EXPR="${OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y}"
    ;;
  top-left)
    OV_X_EXPR="${OVERLAY_OFFSET_X}"
    OV_Y_EXPR="${OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y}"
    ;;
  bottom-right)
    OV_X_EXPR="W-w-${OVERLAY_OFFSET_X}"
    OV_Y_EXPR="H-h-${OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y}"
    ;;
  bottom-left)
    OV_X_EXPR="${OVERLAY_OFFSET_X}"
    OV_Y_EXPR="H-h-${OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y}"
    ;;
  *)
    echo "Unknown PLACEMENT '$PLACEMENT' â€” defaulting to top-right"
    OV_X_EXPR="W-w-${OVERLAY_OFFSET_X}"
    OV_Y_EXPR="${OVERLAY_OFFSET_Y}"
    ;;
esac

# build filter_complex.  Place caption at BAR_OFFSET_Y from top; show screenshot overlay starting at FRAME_DELAY_START
# include emoji overlay only if file exists
if [ -f "${EMOJI_PNG}" ]; then
  # compute y offset for emoji over the caption bar (to vertically center inside bar if desired)
  EMOJI_Y_IN_BAR=$(( BAR_OFFSET_Y + (BAR_HEIGHT - EMOJI_SIZE) / 2 ))
  ffmpeg -y -i "$INPUT_FILE" -i "$SCREENSHOT_PNG" -i "$CAPTION_PNG" -i "${EMOJI_PNG}" -filter_complex "\
[1:v]scale=${OVERLAY_W}:${OVERLAY_H}[ov]; \
[0:v][ov]overlay=x=${OV_X_EXPR}:y=${OV_Y_EXPR}:enable='gte(t,${FRAME_DELAY_START})'[step1]; \
[step1][2:v]overlay=x=(main_w-overlay_w)/2:y=${BAR_OFFSET_Y}[step2]; \
[3:v]scale=${EMOJI_SIZE}:${EMOJI_SIZE}[emoji]; \
[step2][emoji]overlay=x=${EMOJI_OFFSET_X}:y=${EMOJI_OFFSET_Y}" \
  -r ${FPS} -c:v libx264 -preset veryfast -c:a copy -y "$OUT_VIDEO"
else
  ffmpeg -y -i "$INPUT_FILE" -i "$SCREENSHOT_PNG" -i "$CAPTION_PNG" -filter_complex "\
[1:v]scale=${OVERLAY_W}:${OVERLAY_H}[ov]; \
[0:v][ov]overlay=x=${OV_X_EXPR}:y=${OV_Y_EXPR}:enable='gte(t,${FRAME_DELAY_START})'[step1]; \
[step1][2:v]overlay=x=(main_w-overlay_w)/2:y=${BAR_OFFSET_Y}" \
  -r ${FPS} -c:v libx264 -preset veryfast -c:a copy -y "$OUT_VIDEO"
fi

if [ $? -eq 0 ] && [ -f "$OUT_VIDEO" ]; then
  echo "WROTE final video -> $OUT_VIDEO"
  exit 0
else
  echo "ERR: final ffmpeg compose failed" >&2
  exit 1
fi

=INPUT_URL="{{ $json.DirectUrl }}"
REL_PATH=$(echo "$INPUT_URL" | sed -E 's@https?://[^/]+/@@')
INPUT_FILE="/files/$REL_PATH"
OUTPUT_FILE="/files/$REL_PATH"
TMP_FILE="${OUTPUT_FILE}.tmp.mp4"
mkdir -p "$(dirname "$OUTPUT_FILE")"

ASSETS_DIR="/files/extra"
EYE_ICON="${ASSETS_DIR}/eye.png"
EMOJI_IMG="${ASSETS_DIR}/emoji.png"
FRAME_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/frame_with_views.png"
CAPTION_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/caption_canvas.png"
TMP_TEXT_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/_caption_text.png"

# font fallback
if [ -f "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf" ]; then
  FONT="/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf"
else
  FONT="/usr/share/fonts/truetype/freefont/FreeSansBold.ttf"
fi

# random views 1..100M
VNUM=$(( (RANDOM % 100) + 1 ))
VIEWS="${VNUM}M"

# build frame_with_views.png in /files/extra
ICON_SIZE=64
OFFSET_X=24
OFFSET_Y=24
FONTSIZE=48
ffmpeg -ss 2 -i "$INPUT_FILE" -i "$EYE_ICON" -frames:v 1 -filter_complex "\
[1:v]scale=${ICON_SIZE}:${ICON_SIZE}[icon]; \
[0:v][icon]overlay=x=${OFFSET_X}:y=H-${OFFSET_Y}-${ICON_SIZE}[with_icon]; \
[with_icon]drawtext=fontfile='${FONT}':text='${VIEWS}':x=${OFFSET_X}+${ICON_SIZE}+10:y=H-${OFFSET_Y}-${ICON_SIZE}/2-text_h/2:fontsize=${FONTSIZE}:fontcolor=white:borderw=2:bordercolor=black" \
 -y "$FRAME_PNG"

# build caption_canvas.png in /files/extra
VID_W=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=width -of csv=p=0 "$INPUT_FILE" || echo 1080)
BAR_HEIGHT=110
FONTSIZE_CAP=64
EMOJI_SIZE=64
TITLE="Thank you for ${VIEWS} views"
convert -background none -font "${FONT}" -pointsize "${FONTSIZE_CAP}" label:"${TITLE}" "${TMP_TEXT_PNG}"
TEXT_W=$(identify -format "%w" "${TMP_TEXT_PNG}")
TEXT_H=$(identify -format "%h" "${TMP_TEXT_PNG}")
TEXT_X=$(( (VID_W - TEXT_W) / 2 ))
TEXT_Y=$(( (BAR_HEIGHT - TEXT_H) / 2 ))
EMOJI_X=$(( TEXT_X + TEXT_W + 12 ))
EMOJI_Y=$(( (BAR_HEIGHT - EMOJI_SIZE) / 2 ))
ffmpeg -f lavfi -i "color=rgba(0,0,0,0):s=${VID_W}x${BAR_HEIGHT}:d=1" -i "${TMP_TEXT_PNG}" -i "${EMOJI_IMG}" -filter_complex "\
[2:v]scale=${EMOJI_SIZE}:${EMOJI_SIZE}[e]; \
[0:v][1:v]overlay=x=${TEXT_X}:y=${TEXT_Y}[t1]; \
[t1][e]overlay=x=${EMOJI_X}:y=${EMOJI_Y}" -frames:v 1 -y "${CAPTION_PNG}"

# final composition (video + /files/extra/frame_with_views.png + caption)
ffmpeg -y -i "$INPUT_FILE" -i "$FRAME_PNG" -i "$CAPTION_PNG" -filter_complex "\
[1:v]scale=300:480[ov]; \
[0:v][ov]overlay=W-w-20:20[step1]; \
[step1]drawbox=x=0:y=0:w=iw:h=${BAR_HEIGHT}:color=black@0.3:t=fill[step2]; \
[step2][2:v]overlay=x=(main_w-overlay_w)/2:y=0" \
-r 30 -c:v libx264 -preset veryfast -c:a copy "$TMP_FILE"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  mv -f "$TMP_FILE" "$OUTPUT_FILE"
  chmod 644 "$OUTPUT_FILE" || true
  echo "DONE: $OUTPUT_FILE (views=${VIEWS})"
else
  echo "ERR: ffmpeg failed"
  [ -f "$TMP_FILE" ] && rm -f "$TMP_FILE"
  exit 1
fi
